errors.error_description: The installation instructions for building from source omit the required `numpy` dependency, which is not listed as a dependency in setup.py and will cause the build to fail if not pre-installed.
correction_candidates: Run `pip install .[dev]` to install all dependencies including NumPy.
The package installs NumPy automatically, no changes are needed.
Modify the `setup.py` file to include `numpy` in `install_requires` before running `pip install .`
Before installing, ensure you have NumPy installed: `pip install numpy`, then run `pip install .`
errors.golden_answer: Before installing, ensure you have NumPy installed: `pip install numpy`, then run `pip install .`
